Subskills.name: Boulder Lob
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of frozen boulder.

Subskills.name: Petrifying Frost
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by frozen boulder.

Subskills.name: Rolling Winterstone
Subskills.description: Frozen boulder rolls on the ground gathering monsters on its path exploding when hitting terrain and dealing increased damage per monster gathered.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Slab
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of frozen boulder bounces.

Subskills.name: Shattering Frost
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Expanding Stonefrost
Subskills.description: Increases the size of frozen boulder.

Subskills.name: Subzero Temp
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict freeze on hit.

Subskills.name: Frozen Throbbing
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frozen targets.

Subskills.name: Boulder Barrage
Subskills.description: Unleash a barrage of smaller frozen boulders in an arc. Frozen boulder has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Pulsing Monolith
Subskills.description: Frozen boulder unleashes a frozen nova with each bounce dealing a portion of its damage.

Subskills.name: Stonecold Master
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of frozen boulder.

Subskills.name: Demolishing Frostone
Subskills.description: Chance to knock monsters back on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Overgrowing Boulder
Subskills.description: Frozen boulder grows in size gaining increased damage with each bounce also bouncing off of terrain.

Subskills.name: Splinter Stones
Subskills.description: Frozen boulder explodes into chunks of ice on hit dealing increased damage.
